longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  during the period of the intended stay. 

Visa required.

Visa Issuance:
- Holders of a letter of invitation issued by a company
  registered in Turkmenistan (prior approval from the Ministry
  of Foreign Affairs is required) can obtain a visa on
  arrival,  for a max. stay of 10 days. Fee: varies between
  USD 40. - and USD 155.- Extension of a further10 days is
  possible. 
Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Mayotte will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
- A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of
  Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting
   
- Valid visas in expired passports are accepted, provided
  accompanied by a valid passport of the same nationality.
  Immigration will, on arrival, transfer the visa to the new
  passport for a fee of USD 40.-.
- Visitors are required to fill out a landing card. Fee: USD
  12
